post.title: Carp and Capt on a typical day out

body:
1rst Was my warning because of me pinging you, or because of my previous interaction with @fuckshit?
If it is about @fuckshit this is literally my first time interacting with him directly. If it's about you please read part 3.


2nd is @fuckshit being warned because of his interaction with me, or is it from some other user in the site?

3rd How about you respond to the claims of unjust bans in +changelog? 

Over half of those were bs and the users know it. You also ignored the other users that questioned it. How is a website "free speech" if the admins can't handle criticism and ignore it for as long as possible. That is why I called you u/spez in +changelog and like a typical Redd*t mod you exiled me, ignored the claims of your bs, and even exiled people who question it: https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/mod/log/pnn. Your site will eventually die if you continue to do that or the community will just see you as another power hungry Redd*t mod, and it's is not convenient for you or the other mods for the community to think that way.

I bet you will ignore responding to that last part, unless I pissed you off just enough to get a half assed "mods can do what they want with their guilds" excuse. It won't work on this since the guild has no rules on the side bar as of the time of this post and the bans. The only no no speech is not allowed was not on +changelog and nobody will bother to look for that post or comment in +Ruqqus. If Ruqqus isn't free speech then don't advertise it like it is.

Lastly make sure to fix this: https://ruqqus.com/+BetaFeedback/post/86o6/the-admins-might-want-to-rethink

and also I have no regrets.

@captainmeta4 can I expect an explanation within the next 2 days or so? If so it would also be helpful if you stated what the admins considered harassment as well.

Edit: Ignore that last part thanks to a random user I found what constitutes as harassment: https://ruqqus.com/+RuqqusAdmin/post/6iud/bigbertha-unbanned-due-to-internal-discussion

>Moving forward, we will action harassment if it extends to the point where the target cannot deal with it using the built-in user blocking and guild blocking features.

>For example, if a guild is targeted at someone and its members:

>Routinely make multiple accounts to evade blocks, or
Conduct harassing activities outside the guild
Then that guild would be banned.

>+BigBertha did not meet this standard and is now unbanned.
body_html:
@captainmeta4 can I expect an explanation within the next 2 days or so? If so it would also be helpful if you stated what the admins considered harassment as well.

Edit: Ignore that last part thanks to a random user I found what constitutes as harassment: https://ruqqus.com/+RuqqusAdmin/post/6iud/bigbertha-unbanned-due-to-internal-discussion

Moving forward, we will action harassment if it extends to the point where the target cannot deal with it using the built-in user blocking and guild blocking features.

For example, if a guild is targeted at someone and its members:

Routinely make multiple accounts to evade blocks, or Conduct harassing activities outside the guild Then that guild would be banned.

+BigBertha did not meet this standard and is now unbanned.

post.title: Carp and Capt on a typical day out

body: I find it funny that certain users constantly have issues with the mods/admins.... and I can never figure out why because there's a shit ton of us who never have issues.... ever, at all. Why? We don't break or subvert the rules, or put a target on our own ass by poking the admins with a stick until we piss them off just to get attention. Is that what this is about? Getting attention? Kids do that, too. I have a niece who will stand at the counter, put her hand on her mother's best crystal bowl and pretend to be ready to push it off to break it until her mother gets furious enough to scream and threaten her. Kind of like that. But of course, I know anyone old enough to be on this site would have better behavior than a behaviorally challenged 8 year old. Anything else would be just plain silly.

parent.body:
1rst Was my warning because of me pinging you, or because of my previous interaction with @fuckshit?
If it is about @fuckshit this is literally my first time interacting with him directly. If it's about you please read part 3.


2nd is @fuckshit being warned because of his interaction with me, or is it from some other user in the site?

3rd How about you respond to the claims of unjust bans in +changelog? 

Over half of those were bs and the users know it. You also ignored the other users that questioned it. How is a website "free speech" if the admins can't handle criticism and ignore it for as long as possible. That is why I called you u/spez in +changelog and like a typical Redd*t mod you exiled me, ignored the claims of your bs, and even exiled people who question it: https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/mod/log/pnn. Your site will eventually die if you continue to do that or the community will just see you as another power hungry Redd*t mod, and it's is not convenient for you or the other mods for the community to think that way.

I bet you will ignore responding to that last part, unless I pissed you off just enough to get a half assed "mods can do what they want with their guilds" excuse. It won't work on this since the guild has no rules on the side bar as of the time of this post and the bans. The only no no speech is not allowed was not on +changelog and nobody will bother to look for that post or comment in +Ruqqus. If Ruqqus isn't free speech then don't advertise it like it is.

Lastly make sure to fix this: https://ruqqus.com/+BetaFeedback/post/86o6/the-admins-might-want-to-rethink

and also I have no regrets.

post.title: Carp and Capt on a typical day out

body:
Over half of these exiles were unjustified: https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/mod/log

@diogenesjunior got exiled for pointing out how Roy's exile was bs. Cap's explanation was more than half-assed and ignored the other users who questioned it. My actions don't count as "harassment" according to an old post about what harassment means: https://ruqqus.com/+RuqqusAdmin/post/6iud/bigbertha-unbanned-due-to-internal-discussion

>Moving forward, we will action harassment if it extends to the point where the target cannot deal with it using the built-in user blocking and guild blocking features.

>For example, if a guild is targeted at someone and its members:

>Routinely make multiple accounts to evade blocks, or
Conduct harassing activities outside the guild
Then that guild would be banned.

>+BigBertha did not meet this standard and is now unbanned.

Cap also didn't tell me what I specifically did to harass others. What I've done doesn't fit what I linked earlier so I'm not sure if it is harassment.
body_html:
Over half of these exiles were unjustified: https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/mod/log

@diogenesjunior got exiled for pointing out how Roy's exile was bs. Cap's explanation was more than half-assed and ignored the other users who questioned it. My actions don't count as "harassment" according to an old post about what harassment means: https://ruqqus.com/+RuqqusAdmin/post/6iud/bigbertha-unbanned-due-to-internal-discussion

Moving forward, we will action harassment if it extends to the point where the target cannot deal with it using the built-in user blocking and guild blocking features.

For example, if a guild is targeted at someone and its members:

Routinely make multiple accounts to evade blocks, or Conduct harassing activities outside the guild Then that guild would be banned.

+BigBertha did not meet this standard and is now unbanned.
